level.text: Only a person currently licensed as a registered nurse under chapter 54 of this title shall be eligible to apply for a license to practice nurse-anesthesia under this chapter.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 36 DCR 3491 (May 12, 1989); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 49 DCR 11751 (December 27, 2002).
